name: NeoWings
description:
Instructions

The objective is to shoot down the enemy ship while avoiding the same fate. To achieve this the players can place mirrors to reflect bullets shot at them while they use their opponents mirrors against them. 

Controls:

Player 1:
- W: Accelerate;
- S: Decelerate;
- A: Turn left;
- D: Turn right;
- Space: Confirm/Shoot
- Tab: Cancel/Place mirror
- Left Shift: Boost

Player 2:
- Up: Accelerate;
- Down: Decelerate;
- Left: Turn left;
- Right: Turn right;
- Right Shift: Confirm/Shoot
- Enter: Cancel/Place mirror
- Backspace: Cancel/Place mirror
